dublin_core.dcvalue: Several important problems in the majority of countries are challenging the centralized and overburdened current model of healthcare Telehealthcare is presented as a new paradigm that offers high expectations to solve this picture In this paper we present the major outcomes of the viability study of a novel personalized telehealthcare system for nephrology NEFROTEL
Viability study of a personalized and adaptive knowledge-generation telehealthcare system for nephrology (NEFROTEL).
